'''Minigame''' may refer to:
* {{slink|Server|Minigame}} &ndash; a short game contained within ''Minecraft'', having different [[gameplay]] elements from the main game itself. They are usually hosted within servers, with popular examples being sky wars, bed wars, [[spleef]], {{w|Capture the flag#Software and games|capture the flag}}, and etc.
* [[Mini games]] &ndash; game modes exclusive to {{LCE}}.
